channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.description:

item.title: Report X-2024030388
item.description:
Report X-2024030388

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-12T15:28:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was dropped and placed in lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPA. DescribePack: There is a crack approximately 1/4 of the way around the bottom of the inner plastic container. One edge of the bottom closure ripped and tape failed allowing the inner container to fall out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.
